reviews.review: This game is way more fun than expected. Lots of potential to have fun both solo and playing with friends. I wish I had found this game years ago. The game still has lots more potential, and there is plenty of room to enjoy it at all skill levels.
BEST GAME EVER. Especially with friends that try and get you killed :-).

This game is a LOT of fun. I heard people talking about the toxicity on this game but I don't get it. This game is even better when you get a bunch of buddies together. The DLC is also great with characters from amazing horror franchises and some original characters from the developers.

Honestly really fun horror game to play, what kills it for me it that I can never play as a survivor because there are constant trolls teaming up against the killer. I don't mind that players want to play as a team, but this is out of control. I'm forced to always play as killer, if I want to play as a survivor, I have better chance of finishing every Nightmare on elm street movie before being able to join a game as survivor. It suck too that I got dlc for survivors such as Ash Williams that I'm not able to use because of this, which is not fair considering I paid for this. I want to give this game a like, but that fact that these issues go unresolved is unacceptable.

This game routinely generates some of the most unique and memorable player interactions in any game I've played. There is a lot of emotion conveyed in exactly how rapidly you get tea-bagged or pointed at.

It takes a very long time to get to have the perks and the experience required to even know if you like this one. If you like the idea of horror movie icons chasing Christmas elves through cornfields then this is the only place you're going to find it.

Play it casually (with friends as a survivor) and you'll probably see the fraying edges of the glaring balance issues, but they wont be consistently bothersome.

I play it because I like scaring people and chasing them around the neighborhood, but my parole officer told me to stop doing that.

I bought this game both on ps and steam, but I play it on ps and I've played it for about a month now. I have two level 50 survivors and a slightly leveled killer. 
This would be a really good multiplayer survival horror game, however it is spoiled by about a third of killers (that's being quite lenient) . Once every two or three games you'd get matched up with a killer that just camps one survivor at a time. This results in very poor and unenjoyable gameplay. If nothing changes I probably will stop playing because those players just ruin the game. And I'm not the only one saying this, I play with another person and they feel the same way and so do other people who they play with.
Right now I would not reccomend anyone playing this game, the enjoyable matches are too sparce.
Magnifico juego para jugar con amigos ( ME GUSTARIA QUE TENGA SOPORTE PARA 3 MONITORES )

Hola, mi nombre es Javier Solano, tengo que decir que este juego me ha cambiado la vida. Antes, solÃ­a salir con mis amigos todos los dÃ­as, pero descubrimos este juego, y nos viciamos a Ã©l, con lo que solo salÃ­amos de vez en cuando ahora. Es un juego impresionante la verdad, tiene iconos del terror como Leatherface, Michael Myers, Ghostface...y muchos mÃ¡s. TambiÃ©n el gameplay es bastante instintivo, y tu objetivo como asesino o superviviente estÃ¡ bien claro. El Ãºnico problema es que los amigos con los que jugaba ya no son amigos mÃ­os, que les jodan, para la prÃ³xima que aprendan que no voy a ir a salvarlos contra un leatherface facecampeando, hijos de puta.

After a few years and many classic re- done RPGs I played recently I found a new favorite! If you are father with a full time job, kids and only have time for a match or two here or there - this is the right game for you! Warning! It's goddamn addictive! I have been playing mostly killers until I realized the other side of the coin is also fun and very well designed. Overall it's incredible fun and there's much more to explore, time and money well spent for certain :)
